name: Polterguest
description:
How to play?
  • Move between objects with double-clic
  • Activate your current object with double-clic
  • Some objects trigger animals...

_________

The only thing left is your soul.

Bound to objects, you are a Poltergeist struggling to find its way outside to reach Heaven. Possess the many objects and animals at your reach to get closer to your goal!

Theme

This game was made as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2021. The theme was Joined Together. Indeed, as the player, you can only interact and move while being joined with something.

Special thanks
  • Nanokiee for the amazing meals you did for us during the weekend! (She cooks very well, you can see that by yourself : Nanokiee's youtube channel)
  • You for playing (cliché but hey, that's true)
